SKT_FIRST.name: Meow Meow Zap!
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>50%</color> chance to increase the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Accuracy</color> for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与え、<color=#28d9ed>50%</color>の確率で自分の<color=#28d9ed>命中</color>が<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間UPする。
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_kr: 적을 공격하고 <color=#28d9ed>50%</color> 확률로 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>명중</color>이 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 동안 증가합니다.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_zh: 攻击敌人,并有<color=#28d9ed>50%</color>的几率使自身<color=#28d9ed>命中</color>提升,持续<color=#28d9ed>1回合</color>。

SKT_SECOND.name: Lightning Bolt!
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: Attacks 2 enemies.\nAttacks all enemies if the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Attack</color> is currently increased.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_jp: 敵2体にダメージを与える。\n自分の<color=#28d9ed>攻撃力</color>がUPした状態の場合、敵全体にダメージを与える。
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_kr: 적 2인을 공격합니다.\n자신이 <color=#28d9ed>공격력</color>이 증가한 상태라면 적 전체를 공격합니다.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_zh: 攻击2名敌人。\n若自身<color=#28d9ed>攻击力</color>处于提升状态,则攻击全体敌人。

SKT_BURST_3.effect_jp: 強化スキルに変更\n貫通力UP
SKT_BURST_3.effect_zh: 转化为强化技能\n穿透力提升

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Meowteor Shower
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Attacks all enemies and increases your <color=#28d9ed>ATK</color> for <color=#28d9ed>2</color> turns.\nDeals an additional <color=#28d9ed>20%</color> damage to Earth-attribute targets.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_jp: 敵全体を攻撃し、自身の<color=#28d9ed>攻撃力</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2</color>ターンの間上昇させます。\n<color=#28d9ed>地属性</color>対象に対して与えるダメージが<color=#28d9ed>20%</color>追加で増加します。
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_kr: 적 전체를 공격하고 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>공격력</color>이 증가합니다.\n지속성 대상에 대한 피해량이 추가로 <color=#28d9ed>20%</color> 증가합니다.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_zh: 攻击全体敌人,并在<color=#28d9ed>2</color>回合内提高自身<color=#28d9ed>攻击力</color>。\n对<color=#28d9ed>土属性</color>目标额外造成<color=#28d9ed>20%</color>伤害。

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Starter Effect</color>: Increases all allies' Accuracy during the Skill Chain attack.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>100%</color> chance to grant increased <color=#28d9ed>Accuracy</color> to the caster for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_jp: <color=#ffd732>チェーン効果(初手)</color>:チェーン攻撃の間、味方全体の命中がUPする。\n\n<color=#ffd732>連携効果</color>:攻撃後、<color=#28d9ed>100%</color>の確率で自分の<color=#28d9ed>命中</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間UPさせる。
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_kr: <color=#ffd732>체인 스타터 효과</color> : 해당 스킬 체인 공격 동안 모든 아군의 명중이 증가합니다.\n\n<color=#ffd732>협공 효과</color> : 공격 후 <color=#28d9ed>100%</color> 확률로 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>명중</color>을 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 동안 증가시킵니다.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_zh: <color=#ffd732>连携起始效果</color>:在该连携技能攻击的期间内,使全体友军命中提升。\n\n<color=#ffd732>夹攻效果</color>:攻击后,有<color=#28d9ed>100%</color>的几率使自身的<color=#28d9ed>命中</color>提升,持续<color=#28d9ed>1回合</color>。

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
